description:
Belle is a mysterious talking skull with the letters `NQM` carved on its forehead. Queen Marie keeps this skull with her, and it inquires endlessly about her mother, whom the Queen has promised to reunite with Belle when the time is right.
[SPOILER]It is later revealed that Belle`s mother is Madame de Pompadour. Pompadour murdered her, strangling her own daughter because she could not serve both the demands of motherhood and her desire to change the country.[/SPOILER]
name: Belle
